questions. In the event that I am not available, and you need to speak to someone

III. DESCRIPTION OF FINDINGS
The facility is in compliance with all applicable rules and statutes.
IV. TECHNICAL ASSISTANCE
The facility did not require or request any technical assistance.
V. CONSULTATION
No consultation was requester or required.
VI. EVALUATION OF RENEWAL PERIOD
There were no substantiated incidents of maltreatment in care during this licensing
period.
The facility has submitted no acceptable corrective action plans not related to
maltreatment during this licensing period.
The facility has experienced a reduced census during the COVID-19 pandemic. The
staff and youth interviewed reported that the changes to programming and policies
related to the pandemic have been challenging, but they have been able to maintain
compliance with licensing requirements, which was supported by the file reviews.
VII. RECOMMENDATION
Based on inspection findings the facility is in compliance with all applicable licensing
statutes and rules. It is recommended that the facility be issued a renewal of their
regular license.
